question: A Non-Resident Indian wants to get approval under Government Route for FDI in ‘Single Brand’ product retailing in India. Which among the following would be the appropriate agency to approach for this application?
option1: Regional Office of Reserve Bank of India
option2: Head Office of Reserve Bank of India
option3: Department of Economic Affairs (Ministry of Finance)
option4: Department of Industrial Policy and Promotion (Ministry of Commerce)
answer: Department of Industrial Policy and Promotion (Ministry of Commerce)
